summary:
A bright, realistic, vibrant and cinematic ENB, let the holy light cleanse your Skyrim!

By Bawar
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][i]
This ENB is realistic, Vibrant, cinematic, and bright[/i]

This ENB is a mixture of my tow other ENB's as well as other ENBs that I have made for myself, but not published before

This is also the ENB that took me the longest to develop and make!

Holy Vibrancy ENB is called 'Holy Vibrancy ENB' for one reason - it is the holy grail of all my ENB's that I have ever made - all the hundreds of hours that I have put into ENB's for myself, and others, has been mixed into this ENB - The main ENB that I used for this ENB was Cinematic Vibrancy ENB.

[color=#ff00ff]~~~~~This ENB has -currently- two versions, with and without the letterbox effect. Personally I use the letter box effect just because I like it, but for everyone else, there is a version that is without it~~~~~[/color]


Please remember to endorse and comment - your comments for improvements or suggestions really do help me to make the best things I can for you guys! 


[youtube]cS7m1BMLKs4[/youtube]

[youtube]Kz5xVGq8tIo[/youtube]


Required Mods:

Extreme Grass - all the grass that you can see in the ENB is because of this mod

Seasons of Skyrim Springtime overhaul - helps to make everything more crisp

Holy - made by me, really helps to reinforce vibrancy and realism, and makes most things look better!
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80001/?

Optional Mods:

Grass fields - adds denser grass 

Climates of Tamriel

Whatever else you want !!!


INSTALLATION 


Really simple, all you need to do is go to where your Skyrim Directory is ( where TESV.exe is ) and paste all the files in the ENB downloaded folder into your directory!

If you do get stuck or need more help, then watch the video below:

[youtube]FHCYoVB8P_Y[/youtube]


Thank you --- you awesome people!

[font=Times New Roman]-B[/font][font=Georgia]A[/font][font=Verdana]W[/font][font=Georgia]A[/font][font=Trebuchet MS]R[/font]
[/size][/center]
author: Bawar
